rukus.text: 16|61|Ara allah‌ yadi manusake tadera simalanghanera jan'ya sasti ditena tabe bhuprsthe kono jiba- jantuke'i reha'i ditena na [1]; kintu tini eka nirdista kala paryanta taderake abakasa diye thakena. Atahpara yakhana tadera samaya ase takhana tara mahurtakala agate ba pichate pare na.

16|62|Ara ya tara apachanda kare ta-i tara allah‌ra prati aropa kare. Tadera jihba mithya barnana kare ye, mangala to tadera'i jan'ya [1]. Nihsandehe tadera jan'ya ache aguna, ara niscaya taderake'i sabara age tate niksepa kara habe [2].

16|63|Sapatha allah‌ra! Amara apanara age'o bahu jatira kache rasula pathiyechi; kintu sayatana aisaba jatira karyakalapa tadera drstite sobhana karechila; kaje'i se –i aja [1] tadera abhibhakaka ara tadera'i jan'ya rayeche yantranadayaka sasti.

16|64|Ara amara to apanara prati kitaba nayila karechi yara e bisaye matabheda kare taderake suspastabhabe bujhiye deyara jan'ya ebam yara imana ane emana sampradayera jan'ya pathanirdesa o dayasbarupa [1].
16|65|Ara allah‌ akasa hate bari barsana karena ebam ta diye tini bhumike tara mrtyura para punarjibita karena. Niscaya ete nidarsana rayeche emana sampradayera jan'ya yara katha sone [1].
